sentences: Helge Bonnén (22 March 1896 – 3 August 1983) was a Danish composer and pianist.
Bonnen was responsible for starting the Young Musician Society (UTS), it is now known as Young Tone Artists (DUT).
He was a founding member of the Danish Music Magazine (DMT) and President of the UTS for 2 periods and editor of the DMT in the 1920s.
